sentences.sContent: The doctor had encountered several similar cases in the past.
sentences.sCn: 那位医生过去曾碰到过好几个类似病例。

sentences.sContent: ...encounter with writer's block--I was not able to produce anything for three years...
...What problem did Chris encounter in his Division...
...Do spacemen carry weapons in case they encounter enemies in space...

remMethod.val: en(使…) ＋ counter(相反的) → 使从两个相反的方向来 → 遇到

trans.tranOther: to experience something, especially problems or opposition
an occasion when you meet someone, or do something with someone you do not know
